recieve_offersmail: Yes, I would like to recieve email newsletters with special promotions, I can unsubscribe at any time
recieve_offersmail_header: Email-exclusive Offers and coupon codes for subscribers!
best_deals: GET GREAT DEALS ON CAR PARTS FROM THE BEST MANUFACTURERS IN OUR ONLINE SHOP
support_header: If you have questions or suggestions, you can contact us
returns_refunds_body:
Welcome to the Trkar product returns portal 
Here you can quickly and easily register your product return. 
How it works:    
Enter your postcode and order number, and select the products you want to return. 
Your product return will be processed as quickly as possible. 
When returning products, please note: 
- Goods that have been damaged or modified are excluded from exchange. 
- If the original packaging has been damaged, the value of the packaging may be deducted from your refund.
postal_code_refunds_hint: The postcode of the address the order was shipped to
delivery_for_island: SHIPPING COSTS TO ISLANDS AND REGIONS
delivery_times_body: Delivery time depends on the product availability. Please check the availability status on the page of the product you are interested in. No delivery on bank holidays.
in_stock_body: The item is available. Items with this availability status are sent within 1-2 working days after the receipt of payment
not_in_stock_body: This item cannot be ordered. It is no longer available or has been discontinued. You can order a similar item from a different manufacturer.
credit_card_details:
Credit card: 

After you have chosen credit card as payment method, please click on “confirm order”. After this you will be redirected to a secure page where you can select your credit card type. Finally, you have to enter the correct card information and to confirm the payment. Your card will be charged after your order has been completed.
paypal_details:
Pay Pal: 

After you place the order, you will be redirected to the PayPal sign-in page. Please sign in and make the payment. To pay by means of PayPal you need to have a PayPal account. There are no additional charges in connection with this.
car_accessories_body: Everything for your car from one provider. In our online shop you find numerous car accessory items: From interor and exterior car care up to many gadgets and accessories for travelling and transportation.
